Package controller

Class CinemaShowTimeController

java.lang.Object
controller.CinemaShowTimeController
public class CinemaShowTimeController extends Object
This class represents the Controller for CinemaShowTime It handles all database functions related to CinemaShowTime database file

    • CinemaShowTimeController

      public CinemaShowTimeController()

  • Method Details

    • createCinemaShowTime

      public static boolean createCinemaShowTime(CinemaShowTime newCinemaShowTime)
      CREATE a CinemaShowTime, adding into the database file with separator | e.g. showTimeId|cinemaCode|movieId|movieStartTime|movieEndTime as well as creating a copy of the static Cinema Seating Layout into the showtime seatinglayout folder
      Parameters:
      newCinemaShowTime - New CinemaShowTime to be added
      Returns:
      True if created successfully, false otherwise

    • updateCinemaShowTime

      public static void updateCinemaShowTime(CinemaShowTime updatedCinemaShowTime)
      UPDATE a existing CinemaShowTime with an updated data
      Parameters:
      updatedCinemaShowTime - CinemaShowTime to be updated and its values

    • deleteCinemaShowTimeById

      public static void deleteCinemaShowTimeById(int deletedShowTimeId)
      DELETE CinemaShowTime by its ID, removing from the database
      Parameters:
      deletedShowTimeId - CinemaShowTime to be deleted

    • getAllCinemaShowTimeList

      public static ArrayList<CinemaShowTime> getAllCinemaShowTimeList()
      READ all the CinemaShowTime in the Database file, Store the result in an arraylist of CinemaShowTime return empty array list if no CinemaShowTime exist
      Returns:
      an array list of all CinemaShowTime

    • getCinemaShowTimeByCineplexCodeList

      public static ArrayList<CinemaShowTime> getCinemaShowTimeByCineplexCodeList(String cineplexCode)
      READ all the CinemaShowTime in array list by getAllCinemaShowTimeList() Check if the CinemaShowTime's Cinema belong to the Cineplex Store into an array list of CinemaShowTime if it does return empty array list if no CinemaShowTime exist for that Cineplex
      Parameters:
      cineplexCode - CinemaShowTime's Cinema's CineplexCode
      Returns:
      an array list of all CinemaShowTime by that CineplexCode

    • getCinemaShowTimeByCinemaCodeList

      public static ArrayList<CinemaShowTime> getCinemaShowTimeByCinemaCodeList(String cinemaCode)
      READ all the CinemaShowTime in array list by getAllCinemaShowTimeList() Store into an array list of CinemaShowTime if CinemaShowTime's Cinema Code matches return empty array list if no CinemaShowTime exist for that Cinema Code
      Parameters:
      cinemaCode - CinemaShowTime's Cinema Code
      Returns:
      an array list of all CinemaShowTime by that CinemaCode

    • getCinemaShowTimeByMovieIdList

      public static ArrayList<CinemaShowTime> getCinemaShowTimeByMovieIdList(int movieId)
      READ all the CinemaShowTime in array list by getAllCinemaShowTimeList() Store into an array list of CinemaShowTime if CinemaShowTime's Movie ID matches return empty array list if no CinemaShowTime exist for that Movie ID
      Parameters:
      movieId - CinemaShowTime's Movie's ID
      Returns:
      an array list of all CinemaShowTime by that MovieID

    • getCinemaShowTimeByShowTimeId

      public static CinemaShowTime getCinemaShowTimeByShowTimeId(int showTimeId)
      READ all the CinemaShowTime in array list by getAllCinemaShowTimeList() returns the CinemaShowTime if CinemaShowTime's ID matches return null if no such CinemaShowTime exist
      Parameters:
      showTimeId - CinemaShowTime's showTimeId
      Returns:
      CinemaShowTime by that showTimeId

    • orderCinemaShowTime

      public static void orderCinemaShowTime(ArrayList<CinemaShowTime> cinemaShowTimeList)
      Orders the CinemaShowTime of array list by the CinemaCode, followed by the Starting Time of the CinemaShowTime
      Parameters:
      cinemaShowTimeList - A list of CinemaShowTime to be sorted
